DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effectiveness of the telephone intervention program for caregivers of colorectal cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Telephone Intervention for Colorectal Cancer Caregivers
DOC.detailed_description: telephone Intervention refer to provide counseling and education to caregivers of colorectal cancer by mode of telephone
DOC.criteria: Family members with newly diagnosed colorectal cancer within the past 4 week and treated in Queen Mary Hospital Self identified as formal or informal family caregivers Over 18 years old Chinese Cantonese speaking Cognitive disability Domestic helpers or maids Non Chinese
